short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Kindle Books are directly in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'Free Kindle Books' brings you daily updates on the best new free kindle books. 

Plus it's FREE! 

Please Note: This is an App with special features to make it easier to find books you want to read - filtering by genre, easy and quick navigation between books, information on Sub-Genres and Review Ratings. 

***** 

'Free Kindle Books' brings you human curated free kindle books. You get - 

1) 30 to 50 free kindle books every day. The best ones - handpicked and curated. So you don't have to waste your time sorting out good from bad. 

Please Note: Prices might change. Please check the book price on the Book Product Page BEFORE buying. 

2) Special Classification - Particularly good free books and deals have 'Recommended', 'Strongly Recommended' and 'Get It Now' tags attached. 

3) Filter by Genre - If you want to see only Romance and Non-Fiction, then go to the Settings Page and choose to Filter by these two Genres. 

Genres Available - Romance, Thrillers & Mysteries, Fantasy & Science Fiction & Horror, Historical Fiction, Christian, Children & Young Adult, Adventure, Non Fiction. 

4) Lots of information to help you decide. 

Book Title, Author, Review Rating, SubGenres are all listed. 

Please Note: Book Covers are not shown. 

5) Easy to Use. 

The App is designed to be easy to use. It both lets you focus on one book at a time (no clutter) and quickly browse through available books. 

6) FREE! 

For free you get - daily updates on the best new free kindle books, ability to filter by the genres you want to read. 

***** 

'Free Kindle Books' takes all the pain out of the process of finding the best new free kindle books. 

Plus it's FREE! 

“This app was not created or endorsed by Amazon.”
